book.synopsis: In the sequel to Creepers, Frank Balenger becomes trapped in a nightmarish web of terror, violence, and death to save himself and the woman he loves by taking part in a high-tech scavenger hunt at the behest of a mysterious Game Master to find a one-hundred-year-old time capsule. 70,000 first printing.
book.dimensions: Height: 9.5 Inches, Length: 6.5 Inches, Weight: 1.4 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
